p: Hence, this study was conducted to determine the following: (1) The chemical composition and antimicrobial properties of the aerial parts of the H. persicum EO collected from the mountainous region in Northeastern of Iran, (2) in vitro antibacterial effect of H. persicum EO, nisin, and Lactobacillus acidophilus against Listeria monocytogenes,and (3) antimicrobial activity of H. persicum EO, L. acidophilus, and nisin against L. monocytogenes in Iranian white cheese.
